title: 一個新手真心請求幫助,希望高手幫忙
author: onneyho
txt_content:
我裝的是@by zx蘿卜卜發放的綠色版1.401Minecraft
想裝ModLoader 及 機械MOD 
巳有給1.401用的Mod Loader 及更新版  ModLoaderMP

裝機械MOD要注意的The download as well includes two txt-files:
IndustrialRecipes.txt has no direct influence on the program, but contains a list of all crafting recipes. 
IndustrialCraftConfig.txt is the config file used by my mod. If you place it in the .minecraft folder (NOT into the minecraft.jar), it will be read and change some standard settings. The file is not required to run IndustrialCraft, it will run fine without them.

在Minecraft的FAQ
Q: Why does my game black screen?
-A: There are a number of reasons this could happen, the most likely is that you're trying to play alpha through the browser. Mods don't work with the browser version. I do not care about black screens. Get me the error log. Follow the instructions under the "Linux / Other" download on www.minecraft.net. This applies to all OS.

看了沒有正確的解決方法

現求解決方法或一個巳裝ModLoader及機械MOD的Minecrat1.401檔

萬二分感謝



原文[1.4_01] IndustrialCraft [v6.00]
